name: The missing animal. Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Pussy.

	A plant, an animal, a Bond girl and avoidance are connected by this feline.

Horse.

	An insect, a vehicle type, brains and poppycock rode in on this horse.

Pig.

	Eat too much, where they live, stubborn and a made up language hogged this answer.

Cow.

	What the cowboy rides, what they leave behind, where they get driven and who drives them links cows.

Fly.

	A boxer, passing in a plane, angling and where you go in a plane connect the buzz word here.

Cat.

	Where a model works, reeds, short sleep and a place of ill repute are what you should have scratched out of these clues.

Dog.

	Where it lives, who chases it, what you do to your page and a religious belief hopefully had you barking up the right tree.

Whale.

	A corset material, the craft to catch one, the largest shark and to assault some one physically got you a gigantic score if you guessed right.

Snake.

	What they shed, what you roll, an entertainer and a cure all elixir crawled in with this answer.

Bird.

	A moron, what they eat, where they live and some one who steals your date had you flying high if you were correct.
